calculation_errors.location: Personnel Detail, Senior Analysts Total Cost

calculation_errors.explanation: The sum of all personnel costs is correct
The sum of all equipment costs is correct
Q1 allocation should be 25% of $215,000 = $53,750, not $150,500
The annual total matches the Department Summary, but quarterly allocations are incorrect

calculation_errors.location: Quarterly Allocation, Travel Q1 and Q4
calculation_errors.explanation: Standard allocation should be 25% of $85,000 = $21,250 per quarter unless justified otherwise

missing_information.description: Signature Page with Department Director signature and submission date
missing_information.impact: Without signatures, the budget submission is not officially approved or verifiable

missing_information.description: Supporting documentation for equipment purchases over $5,000 (servers, printers, software licenses)
missing_information.impact: Lack of quotes or contracts makes it impossible to verify the reasonableness of these expenses

missing_information.description: Detailed breakdown of Travel expenses by purpose and destination
missing_information.impact: Cannot verify if travel expenses are justified without knowing specific conferences/meetings
Cannot verify if training expenses are properly targeted without seeing the training plan

compliance_issues.location: Department Summary, Equipment and Miscellaneous categories
compliance_issues.issue: Year-over-year increases exceed 10% (14.7% and 15.6% respectively) without detailed justification
compliance_issues.recommendation: Provide additional justification for these increases or adjust amounts to stay within 10%

compliance_issues.issue: Personnel costs are correctly allocated equally across quarters (25% each)
compliance_issues.recommendation: No action needed - this complies with regulations

compliance_issues.issue: Miscellaneous expenses ($52,000) exceed 3% of total budget ($2,502,000 × 3% = $75,060) - actually within limit
compliance_issues.recommendation: No action needed - the 3% limit is not exceeded

compliance_issues.location: Personnel Detail, New Position: Junior Analyst
compliance_issues.issue: Account code 1030 (Professional Staff) may not be appropriate for a Junior Analyst position
compliance_issues.recommendation: Verify correct account code with Human Resources classification system

compliance_issues.issue: Non-standard allocation (70% in Q1) without justification
compliance_issues.recommendation: Provide operational justification for uneven allocation or adjust to standard 25% per quarter

compliance_issues.issue: Travel expenses not itemized by purpose and destination
compliance_issues.recommendation: Add detailed breakdown of travel expenses by conference/meeting
